title: Does saying Subhan Rabbi al Ala before going into sujood invalidate the prayer
transcript: and then Selma from the UK um the Saints a bit early before actually going into surgery like um invalidate your prayer no it doesn't it doesn't invalidate your prayer but it has no value so if you thought that while going to sujood you say subhanallah and you touch the ground and you say nothing and you rise up you did not say a thing but if some people out of hastiness while they're going just before touching the ground this is and then they rise up this is okay without any problem in that insha Allah [Music] I am and have you ever taken a counseling session with me go to my website and you will find counseling sessions and apply for one if you can afford it that's good for you if you cannot you're entitled for one free session and this is for everybody if they can affirm by Allah that they cannot afford it because they're poor I'll give them one free session without a problem a full half an hour so come to me and let's speak about it inshallah within the following two days or three days I will uh try and seek Allah's guidance to solve the problem once and for Allah
